title: cmd/gc: wrong line number for error message "missing key in map literal"
body:
1. What is a short input program that triggers the error?
http://play.golang.org/p/HAgOuViPXP

2. What is the full compiler output?
prog.go:6: missing key in map literal

Expecing: line 7 instead.

3. What version of the compiler are you using?  (Run it with the -V flag.)
6g go1.0.2
